27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"How wonderful it is for one of them that he obeys Allah and fulfills the rights of his master." Meaning the slave. And Ka'b said: "Allah and His Messenger spoke the truth

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الْمَمْلُوكِ الصَّالِحِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of The Righteous Slave
